content: ball socks mandy henderson © madcow designs please email questions tomadcowmandy@gmail com i always love to see your posts use #madcowmandydesigns follow me on instagram @madcowmandy introduction this is a very simple pattern for a sock to hold your center pull yarn cake there are three sizes to pick from that will fit a 100gm 50gm or 20gm cake please note some ball winders may produce a slightly different shaped cake i am using a stanwood ball winder link below this pattern is a great way to use scraps from your favorite yarns https //www amazon com/dp/b0078t6kqy psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details materials yarn 5 - 12 grams of fingering weight sock yarn needles 3mm/ us 2 notions stitch markers tapestry needle ruler scissors gauge & size 7 stitches = 1 2 5cm in stockinette abbreviations co - cast on p2tog - purl the next 2 stitches together st s - stitch s skp - slip next stitch as if to knit knit the following stitch pass the slipped stitch k - knit over the knit stitch on right hand needle p - purl m - stitch marker sl - slip_stitch knitwise on knit rounds pm - place stitch marker and slip purlwise on purl rounds sm - slip_stitch marker * - repeat pattern between the *s k2tog - knit the next 2 stitches together 1 ball socks©madcow designs all socks start with a stretchy cast on like the perfectly stretchy cast on https //youtu be/mvj_inzxhee ball sock for 100 gram cake will use about 11 gms of yarn co 56 sts divide sts equally onto your needles join in the round being careful not to twist the work if using a 9 circular place beginning of round marker all other styles will know the beginning of the round is the first stitch on the needle to the left of the tail round 1 *k2 p2* to end of round repeat round 1 for 6 15 cm use a tapestry needle to pick up all 56 sts and cinch tightly to close weave in ends and enjoy ball sock for 50 gram cake will use about 8 gms of yarn co 48sts divide sts equally onto your needles join in the round being careful not to twist the work if using a 9 circular place beginning of round marker all other styles will know the beginning of the round is the first stitch on the needle to the left of the tail round 1 *k2 p2* to end of round repeat round 1 for 5 12 5 cm use a tapestry needle to pick up all 48 sts and cinch tightly to close weave in ends and enjoy 2 ball socks©madcow designs ball sock for 20 gram cake will use about 4 gms of yarn co 32 sts divide sts equally onto your needles join in the round being careful not to twist the work if using a 9 circular place beginning of round marker all other styles will know the beginning of the
